stripped_text: This event is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, if it is not the first time they have drawn cards this turn, they lose 1 credit.
text: This event is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, if it is not the first time they have drawn cards this turn, they lose 1[credit].
title: System Outage
